title: Fulcrum Rapid Red Carbon uniquely asymmetric gravel wheels go faster & wider!
content:
Fulcrum’s Rapid Red Carbon gravel wheels add a new top-tier carbon option to the lineup that is wider, lighter, and faster than ever before – with a completely unique asymmetric profile! Mixing the same tubeless carbon rim tech from Fulcrum’s (and Campagnolo’s) premium road wheels with proven off-road-ready components, these new Rapid Red Carbon wheels

The post Fulcrum Rapid Red Carbon uniquely asymmetric gravel wheels go faster & wider! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
